testcase.name: Getting a customer record by a given customer ID
testcase.system-out: And that a customer exists with "EASTC", "Eastern Connection", "Ann Devon", "Sales Agent", and "(171) 555-0297".passed When I call MongoRS service with a given "EASTC"............................passed Then I should receive a customer record with "EASTC", "Eastern Connection", "Ann Devon", "Sales Agent", and "(171) 555-0297".passed

testcase.name: Getting a customer record by a given customer ID
testcase.system-out: And that a customer exists with "DUMON", "Du monde entier", "Janine Labrune", "Owner", and "France".passed When I call MongoRS service with a given "DUMON"............................passed Then I should receive a customer record with "DUMON", "Du monde entier", "Janine Labrune", "Owner", and "France".passed
